content:
/>
II.ii.2.B.3.c
.
Copies of Records on Loan From VHA
For the purpose of processing benefit claims, VHA
loans
copies of records pertaining to HIV or AIDS, alcohol abuse, drug abuse, or sickle cell anemia to the RO.
RO personnel must
make no additional copies of these records, and
destroy the copies in accordance with
RCS VB-1, Part I, Item No. 13-052.300
after completing adjudication or other proceedings.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B - Restricted Records Storage and Control
citation: Part II, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section B
